Package org.apache.openjpa.jdbc.sql

Class LogicalUnion

java.lang.Object
org.apache.openjpa.jdbc.sql.LogicalUnion
All Implemented Interfaces:
SelectExecutor, Union
public class LogicalUnion extends Object implements Union
A logical union made up of multiple distinct selects whose results are combined in memory.
Author:
Abe White

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static interface 
    LogicalUnion.Selector
    A callback used to create the selects in a SQL union.
    class 
    LogicalUnion.UnionSelect
    A select that is part of a logical union.
